snippet: Knopf will publish in March 2013 a book by the chief operating officer of Facebook, intended to "encourage women to aspire to and pursue leadership roles.''
abstract: Knopf will publish in March 2013 a book by the chief operating officer of Facebook, intended to "encourage women to aspire to and pursue leadership roles.''

headline.main: Book by Facebook's Sheryl Sandberg Will Be Published in March
headline.print_headline: Facebook Executive Turns Talk Into a Book on Women
